mdRecord.dcterms:title: San Xavier Hotel, Tucson, Arizona, ca. 1893
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This photograph shows the former Hotel San Xavier in Tucson Arizona, ca 1893. In foreground are cacti, trees, and a white picket fence, while the hotel is seen in background. Another smaller building is at left. Overall image faded to faint yellowish tan in center and yellw at right and left. At left is a darker brown portion Slight marks are in lower right of the photo
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: George Mason University Libraries Special Collections Research Center
